name: newshero
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: news hero
Developer Terms of Use
des:
News Beat provides live top and breaking headlines from all over the world. News Beat is unlike any other skill on Alexa in that you are able to control what you listen to based on your topics and interests. You can search for specific keywords on the subject you want to hear more about, or alternatively, you can ask News Beat to give you the latest headlines, and it will provide you with the latest top headlines in your area. 

These are just some of the sources we get our news from:
- The Wall Street Journal
- NY times
- USA Today
- Los Angeles Times
- Houston Chronicle
- Chicago Tribune
- Newsday
- CNN
- Wired
- Associated Press
- Ars Technica
- New Scientist
- The Verge
- Next Big Future
- Google News
- The Jerusalem Post
- La Tribune
- Entertainment Weekly
- NPR
- MacRumors
- Business Insider
- Insider.com
- Time Magazine
... AND OVER 30,000 OTHER SOURCES WORLDWIDE!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
